content: if you would like a pdf download of this pattern the option to knit it on straight needles in the round or on a knitting machine as well as instructions for adapting this bra top for any yarn/gauge/needles/bust measurements check out my new pattern get it girl which also has an updated back making the straps easier to attach you can find it here 1 and of course still find this pattern for free below super cute and cozy fashion forward and a great layering piece knitted bra tops are all the rage you ve seen them at free people and urban outfitters and now it s time to knit your own what is a bra top you may wonder it s half bralette half tank top - you can either lounge around in it worn as a bralette if you don t require a lot of support or it can be worn out and about over a bra as a cropped tank top however you decided to rock it you will love it this design uses worsted weight yarn and is knit in the round as one piece so it will knit up quickly with minimal finishing this pattern is quite simple and straight forward as well so if you want to add a stitch pattern do a different type of ribbing do something fun with the straps etc i encourage you to do so and make this bra top uniquely your own please share photos of your finished projects here on ravelry and if you want to ask questions or connect with other knitters knitting the pattern join the knit-a-long here 2 the pattern is free on my blog where i ve also posted a video walking you through each step of the pattern enjoy http //knittingisawesome com/howtoknitabratop/ 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/get-it-girl-bra-top 2 http //www ravelry com/discuss/girly-knits-fan-club/3129604/1-25
